TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from people who've found their next favorite product

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a tech geek, I'm always on the lookout for the latest gadgets. This app never fails to surprise me with its innovative finds!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app introduces me to eco-friendly alternatives. It's made sustainable shopping so much easier!

CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Uncover Hidden Gems and Trending Items
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply input your likes and dislikes, and we'll curate a personalized selection of items for you to explore.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! Most products featured on our app are available for purchase. We provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can buy the items that catch your eye. Some products may be concepts or prototypes, which will be clearly labeled.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items. Our team of curators works tirelessly to bring you fresh and exciting products across various categories.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I save or share products I like?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! You can easily save products to your favorites list for future reference. Additionally, our app allows you to share interesting finds with friends and family via social media or direct messaging, making it simple to spread the word about cool new products.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Explore, Compare, and Stay Ahead with the Latest Innovations
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about discovering new products with our app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, indicate your preferences, and start exploring!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our basic version is completely free. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for those who want an enhanced product discovery experience.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How often are new products added?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We update our product database daily, ensuring you always have access to the latest and most innovative items on the market.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: While we don't handle transactions directly, we provide links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover. Our goal is to help you find great products, wherever they may be sold.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I provide feedback on product recommendations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We value your input! You can rate and review products within the app, which helps us improve our recommendations for you and other users. Your feedback is essential in making our product discovery engine even better.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find Innovative Items Tailored to Your Lifestyle
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your interests, browsing history, and preferences for a unique shopping experience.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with in-depth product reviews and ratings from industry experts and fellow shoppers.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices across multiple retailers and online marketplaces in real-time.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Never miss a new release with instant notifications about upcoming product launches in your favorite categories.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your discoveries, create wishlists, and see what products your friends are loving for a more interactive shopping experience.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products Today!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a world of cutting-edge products, curated just for you. Stay ahead of the curve and be the first to know about exciting new releases.
